mapper.select: select c.message_no as messageNo, c.chat_no as chatNo, c.sender, c.message_content as messageContent, c.message_date as messageDate, c.message_status as messageStatus, (select member_name from member where member_no=c.sender) as senderName, (select member_filepath from member where member_no = c.sender) as filepath from CHAT_MESSAGE c where chat_no=#{chatNo} order by message_date
select chat_no as chatNo from chat where (sender=#{no} and receiver=#{msg}) or (sender=#{msg} and receiver=#{no})
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_message set message_status='y' where chat_no=#{chatNo} and sender=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into chat_message values( MESSAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{chatNo}, #{sender}, #{msg}, to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'n' )
